name: bbn\Appui\Option\Native

nativeOption.name: nativeOption
nativeOption.summary: Returns an option's row as stored in its original form in the database

doc.description:
Returns an option's row as stored in its original form in the database

```php
X::dump($opt->nativeOption(25));
/*
array [
  'id' => 25,
  'code' => "bbn_ide",
  'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
  'id_alias' => null,
  'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}"
]
```
doc.return: Row or null if the option cannot be found

nativeOption.comments:
/**
   * Returns an option's row as stored in its original form in the database
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($opt->nativeOption(25));
   * /*
   * array [
   *   'id' => 25,
   *   'code' => "bbn_ide",
   *   'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
   *   'id_alias' => null,
   *   'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}"
   * ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param mixed $code Any option(s) accepted by {@link fromCode()}
   * @return array|null Row or null if the option cannot be found
   */

nativeOptions.name: nativeOptions

rawOption.name: rawOption
rawOption.summary: Returns an option's row as stored in its original form in the database, including cfg

doc.description:
Returns an option's row as stored in its original form in the database, including cfg

```php
X::dump($opt->rawOption('database', 'appui'));
/*
array [
  'id' => "77cea323f0ce11e897fd525400007196",
  'code' => "bbn_ide",
  'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
  'cfg' => null,
  'id_alias' => null,
  'value' => "{\"num\":1}"
]
```
doc.return: Row or false if the option cannot be found

rawOption.comments:
/**
   * Returns an option's row as stored in its original form in the database, including cfg
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($opt->rawOption('database', 'appui'));
   * /*
   * array [
   *   'id' => "77cea323f0ce11e897fd525400007196",
   *   'code' => "bbn_ide",
   *   'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
   *   'cfg' => null,
   *   'id_alias' => null,
   *   'value' => "{\"num\":1}"
   * ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param mixed $code Any option(s) accepted by {@link fromCode()}
   * @return array|null Row or false if the option cannot be found
   */

rawOptions.name: rawOptions
rawOptions.summary: Returns an option's items as stored in its original form in the database, including cfg

description_parts.content:
X::dump($opt->rawOptions('database', 'appui'));
/*
[
  [
     'id' => "77cea323f0ce11e897fd525400007196",
     'code' => "bbn_ide",
     'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
     'cfg' => null,
     'id_alias' => null,
     'value' => "{\"num\":1}"
   ], [
     'id' => "77cea323f0ce11e897fd525400007196",
     'code' => "bbn_ide",
     'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
     'cfg' => null,
     'id_alias' => null,
     'value' => "{\"num\":1}"
   ]
]

doc.description:
Returns an option's items as stored in its original form in the database, including cfg

```php
X::dump($opt->rawOptions('database', 'appui'));
/*
[
  [
     'id' => "77cea323f0ce11e897fd525400007196",
     'code' => "bbn_ide",
     'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
     'cfg' => null,
     'id_alias' => null,
     'value' => "{\"num\":1}"
   ], [
     'id' => "77cea323f0ce11e897fd525400007196",
     'code' => "bbn_ide",
     'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
     'cfg' => null,
     'id_alias' => null,
     'value' => "{\"num\":1}"
   ]
]
```
doc.return: Row or false if the option cannot be found

rawOptions.comments:
/**
   * Returns an option's items as stored in its original form in the database, including cfg
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($opt->rawOptions('database', 'appui'));
   * /*
   * [
   *   [
   *      'id' => "77cea323f0ce11e897fd525400007196",
   *      'code' => "bbn_ide",
   *      'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
   *      'cfg' => null,
   *      'id_alias' => null,
   *      'value' => "{\"num\":1}"
   *    ], [
   *      'id' => "77cea323f0ce11e897fd525400007196",
   *      'code' => "bbn_ide",
   *      'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
   *      'cfg' => null,
   *      'id_alias' => null,
   *      'value' => "{\"num\":1}"
   *    ]
   * ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param mixed $code Any option(s) accepted by {@link fromCode()}
   * @return array|null Row or false if the option cannot be found
   */

rawTree.name: rawTree
rawTree.summary: Returns a hierarchical structure as stored in its original form in the database

description_parts.content:
X::dump($opt->rawTree('77cea323f0ce11e897fd525400007196'));
/*
array [
  'id' => 12,
  'code' => "bbn_ide",
  'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
  'id_alias' => null,
  'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
  'items' => [
    [
      'id' => 25,
      'code' => "test",
      'text' => "Test",
      'id_alias' => null,
      'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
    ],
    [
      'id' => 26,
      'code' => "test2",
      'text' => "Test 2",
      'id_alias' => null,
      'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
      'items' => [
        [
          'id' => 42,
          'code' => "test8",
          'text' => "Test 8",
          'id_alias' => null,
          'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
        ]
      ]
    ],
  ]
]

doc.description:
Returns a hierarchical structure as stored in its original form in the database

```php
X::dump($opt->rawTree('77cea323f0ce11e897fd525400007196'));
/*
array [
  'id' => 12,
  'code' => "bbn_ide",
  'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
  'id_alias' => null,
  'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
  'items' => [
    [
      'id' => 25,
      'code' => "test",
      'text' => "Test",
      'id_alias' => null,
      'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
    ],
    [
      'id' => 26,
      'code' => "test2",
      'text' => "Test 2",
      'id_alias' => null,
      'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
      'items' => [
        [
          'id' => 42,
          'code' => "test8",
          'text' => "Test 8",
          'id_alias' => null,
          'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
        ]
      ]
    ],
  ]
]
```
doc.return: Tree's array or false if the option cannot be found

rawTree.comments:
/**
   * Returns a hierarchical structure as stored in its original form in the database
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($opt->rawTree('77cea323f0ce11e897fd525400007196'));

   * array [
   *   'id' => 12,
   *   'code' => "bbn_ide",
   *   'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
   *   'id_alias' => null,
   *   'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
   *   'items' => [
   *     [
   *       'id' => 25,
   *       'code' => "test",
   *       'text' => "Test",
   *       'id_alias' => null,
   *       'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
   *     ],
   *     [
   *       'id' => 26,
   *       'code' => "test2",
   *       'text' => "Test 2",
   *       'id_alias' => null,
   *       'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
   *       'items' => [
   *         [
   *           'id' => 42,
   *           'code' => "test8",
   *           'text' => "Test 8",
   *           'id_alias' => null,
   *           'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",

   *       ]

   * ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param mixed $code Any option(s) accepted by {@link fromCode()}

   */

getRow.name: getRow
getRow.summary: Gets the first row from a result

doc.description: Gets the first row from a result

getRow.comments:
/**
   * Gets the first row from a result
   *
   * @param array $where
   * @return array|null
   */

getRows.name: getRows
getRows.summary: Performs the actual query with a where parameter.
getRows.description: Always returns the whole result without limit

description_parts.content: Always returns the whole result without limit

arguments.name: where
arguments.description: The where config for the database query

arguments.name: start
arguments.description: Where to start the query (only if limit is > 1)

doc.description:
Performs the actual query with a where parameter.
Always returns the whole result without limit

params.name: $where
params.description: The where config for the database query

params.name: $start
params.description: Where to start the query (only if limit is > 1)

doc.return: An array of rows, empty if not found, null if there is an error in the where config

getRows.comments:
/**
   * Performs the actual query with a where parameter.
   * Always returns the whole result without limit
   * @param array $where The where config for the database query
   * @param int   $limit Max number of rows
   * @param int   $start Where to start the query (only if limit is > 1)
   * @return array|null An array of rows, empty if not found, null if there is an error in the where config
   */

dummyComments:
/**
   * Returns an option's row as stored in its original form in the database
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($opt->nativeOption(25));
   * /*
   * array [
   *   'id' => 25,
   *   'code' => "bbn_ide",
   *   'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
   *   'id_alias' => null,
   *   'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}"
   * ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param mixed $code Any option(s) accepted by {@link fromCode()}
   * @return array|null Row or null if the option cannot be found
   */

/**
   * Returns an option's row as stored in its original form in the database, including cfg
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($opt->rawOption('database', 'appui'));
   * /*
   * array [
   *   'id' => "77cea323f0ce11e897fd525400007196",
   *   'code' => "bbn_ide",
   *   'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
   *   'cfg' => null,
   *   'id_alias' => null,
   *   'value' => "{\"num\":1}"
   * ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param mixed $code Any option(s) accepted by {@link fromCode()}
   * @return array|null Row or false if the option cannot be found
   */

/**
   * Returns an option's items as stored in its original form in the database, including cfg
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($opt->rawOptions('database', 'appui'));
   * /*
   * [
   *   [
   *      'id' => "77cea323f0ce11e897fd525400007196",
   *      'code' => "bbn_ide",
   *      'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
   *      'cfg' => null,
   *      'id_alias' => null,
   *      'value' => "{\"num\":1}"
   *    ], [
   *      'id' => "77cea323f0ce11e897fd525400007196",
   *      'code' => "bbn_ide",
   *      'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
   *      'cfg' => null,
   *      'id_alias' => null,
   *      'value' => "{\"num\":1}"
   *    ]
   * ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param mixed $code Any option(s) accepted by {@link fromCode()}
   * @return array|null Row or false if the option cannot be found
   */

/**
   * Returns a hierarchical structure as stored in its original form in the database
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($opt->rawTree('77cea323f0ce11e897fd525400007196'));
   * /*
   * array [
   *   'id' => 12,
   *   'code' => "bbn_ide",
   *   'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
   *   'id_alias' => null,
   *   'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
   *   'items' => [
   *     [
   *       'id' => 25,
   *       'code' => "test",
   *       'text' => "Test",
   *       'id_alias' => null,
   *       'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
   *     ],
   *     [
   *       'id' => 26,
   *       'code' => "test2",
   *       'text' => "Test 2",
   *       'id_alias' => null,
   *       'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
   *       'items' => [
   *         [
   *           'id' => 42,
   *           'code' => "test8",
   *           'text' => "Test 8",
   *           'id_alias' => null,
   *           'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
   *         ]
   *       ]
   *     ],
   *   ]
   * ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param mixed $code Any option(s) accepted by {@link fromCode()}
   * @return array|null Tree's array or false if the option cannot be found
   */

/**
   * Returns a hierarchical structure as stored in its original form in the database
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($opt->nativeTree(12));
   * /*
   * array [
   *   'id' => 12,
   *   'code' => "bbn_ide",
   *   'text' => "BBN's own IDE",
   *   'id_alias' => null,
   *   'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
   *   'items' => [
   *     [
   *       'id' => 25,
   *       'code' => "test",
   *       'text' => "Test",
   *       'id_alias' => null,
   *       'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
   *     ],
   *     [
   *       'id' => 26,
   *       'code' => "test2",
   *       'text' => "Test 2",
   *       'id_alias' => null,
   *       'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
   *       'items' => [
   *         [
   *           'id' => 42,
   *           'code' => "test8",
   *           'text' => "Test 8",
   *           'id_alias' => null,
   *           'value' => "{\"myProperty\":\"My property's value\"}",
   *         ]
   *       ]
   *     ],
   *   ]
   * ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param mixed $code Any option(s) accepted by {@link fromCode()}
   * @return array|null Tree's array or false if the option cannot be found
   */

/**
   * Gets the first row from a result
   *
   * @param array $where
   * @return array|null
   */

/**
   * Performs the actual query with a where parameter.
   * Always returns the whole result without limit
   * @param array $where The where config for the database query
   * @param int   $limit Max number of rows
   * @param int   $start Where to start the query (only if limit is > 1)
   * @return array|null An array of rows, empty if not found, null if there is an error in the where config
   */
